appellant.startPageTextEn: Your answers will not affect your appeal.
appellant.startPageTextCy: Ni fydd eich atebion yn effeithio ar eich apêl.
appellant.endPageTextEn: The next steps are to check your appeal details.
appellant.endPageTextCy: Y cam nesaf yw gwirio manylion eich apêl.
appellant.shutterPageTextEn: We have saved your answers and will direct you back to your appeal application now.
appellant.shutterPageTextCy: Rydym wedi cadw eich atebion, ac fe’ch cyfeirir yn ôl at eich cais apêl yn awr
